learning_outcome_details: Articulate with considerable sophistication basic concepts and issues in literary periodization, showing an ability to deal with problems, texts, and figures specific to the European twelfth century and Middle Ages more broadly.
Conduct thorough research into a problem specific to the period in question -- the European 12th century -- and write in a professional, scholarly manner about it.
Show an ability to read, study, research, and write about literary texts from the European 12th century in at least two languages.
Articulate with considerable sophistication basic concepts and issues in literary periodization, showing an ability to deal with problems, texts, and figures specific to European seventeenth century.
Conduct thorough research into a problem specific to the period in question -- the European 17th century -- and write in a professional, scholarly manner about it.
Show an ability to read, study, research, and write about literary texts from the European seventeenth century in at least two languages.
Articulate with considerable sophistication basic concepts and issues in literary periodization, showing an ability to deal with problems, texts, and figures specific to the eighteenth century.
Conduct thorough research into a problem specific to the period in question -- the eighteenth century -- and write in a professional, scholarly manner about it.
Show an ability to read, study, research, and write about literary texts from the eighteenth century in at least two languages.
